title: Formalize the binlog redacting prototype
body:
## Motivation

Scoped down version of #8400
Prototype achieved as part of #9007 (and piloted as part of #9089) needs to have offical source location, pipeline, package publishing destination and process

Envisioned process: Probably keep the the tool as part of MSBuild repo, decide with the team on pipeline and publishing process. Sample minimal documentation should be probably added to MSBuild wiki.

## Expected outputs
- Prototype branch (#9007) merged into main
- Tool has pipeline and package publishing
- Minimal documentation commited, linked via aka.ms link (probably https://aka.ms/binlog-redactor)
